***Introducing The apocalypse KSP Mega-Truck 2.0***

![Qmz3ZDs.png](http://i.imgur.com/Qmz3ZDs.png)

***The ultimate vehicle for all your apocalyptic needs.***

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aZIM6ElIc5c?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Directions:**

**Decouple the axles from the chassis of the vehicle by pressing the space-bar. Using the trim commands [Holding Alt+E] to have the axles automatically turn on electric power. Make sure their SAS is not activated to keep it from stopping the rotation. Then switch back to the main vessel and use the jets as your primary source of power. Turn using the Q and E keys or press "Control here" from the underneath probe core and steer using A and D.**

**Download it here:** [https://www.dropbox.com/s/x6hwm80qpqhqamo/MEGA%20TRUCK%202_0%20%28Apocalypse%29.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/x6hwm80qpqhqamo/MEGA%20TRUCK%202_0%20%28Apocalypse%29.craft?dl=0)

The Original Mega-Truck: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109311-Jon-s-Mega-Truck-Mountain-Climber](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109311-Jon-s-Mega-Truck-Mountain-Climber)

Is it even near a fairing or cargo bay? That's probably your problem, things even slightly clipping with a fairing or cargo bay will quickly explode. It's a well-know bug, it destroyed my orion and constellation landers aeroshells.
Have you Tried the alt f-12 method and allow clipping for that to work?
What does it say on f3?

Squad know their heating system is broken. Hopefully they will fix it soon. Until then you just have to find what part is causing it and work around it. You may need to rebuild the craft but it is fixable. I have had to rebuild my current WIP mission pack three times now. Annoying as it is, I am now super fast at it!
Thanks for all your help! I fixed it and it works great now.
